t: Amazon cuts ties with EU distributors amid wider push to trim costs
s: February 19, 2023 - Amazon plans to cut ties with many European distributors who supply goods on its site, as it looks for ways to trim costs, the company confirmed. Unlike third-party merchants, who handle the selling process themselves, distributors act as a middleman between Amazon and retail brands by buying ...
